desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亞瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亞瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.

desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遙香则布置好了炸弹。無月不解为什么亞瑠不先收钱办事，亞瑠则说是怕被客户干涉太多。

desc.en: The PMC director proposes to add the losses caused by everyone to the amount owed. Hoshino recognizes him, and the latter says hello to Hoshino. Then he "accidentally" leaks his hiring of the Problem Solver 68 and the Helmet Group. Afterwards, he says he wants to have a good talk with Abydos about the debt.

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。

desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.jp: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.

desc.zh_tw: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.

She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.

desc.zh_tw: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。
desc.zh_tw: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.

desc.zh_tw: 夢是阿拜多斯前學生會的主席。她曾與星野一起工作，對未來抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一張與星野一起拍的合照上出現過。當前沒有更多關於她的訊息，但有些人認為她可能已經死了，如在第一篇和最終篇中所呈現的一樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

desc.en: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.

desc.zh_tw: 众人还是不理解PMC究竟在找什么，毕竟石油之类的高价值物品已被探明并不存在。白子想先去调查一下，但被綾音识出可能实为去抢银行，遭到阻止。星野让大家冷静下来，先行回去休息。

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.

desc.zh_tw: 白子和老师等到很晚才离开。星野因疲劳打发走了白子，但老师并未离开。老师拿出了星野的退社信，星野想把问题转移到白子上，但老师紧追不放。星野同意向老师讲述情况，但得出去到走廊上。

desc.en: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".

desc.zh_tw: 因为风沙太大，积尘严重，星野咳了几声，表示学校人手实在不够。星野之后又嘀咕了几句。老师说星野看上去非常喜欢阿拜多斯，后者则表示了否定。之后，星野向老师讲出了那个“请求”。

desc.en: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.

desc.zh_tw: 星野推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。星野表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，星野表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。星野还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。星野走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.

desc.zh_tw: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余對策委員會一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.jp: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".

desc.zh_tw: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。

desc.en: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.jp: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.

desc.zh_tw: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。

desc.en: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.

desc.en: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.

desc.en: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.

desc.zh_tw: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了對策委員會一把。

desc.en: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事闻声走来，众人对凯撒PMC的无理侵犯表示愤怒，但理事并没有被吓倒。虽然扬言要报告联邦学生会，但理事表示联邦学生会并没有用，而且这么长时间以来的事情也证明了没人来帮助他们。理事直接指出，由于学生会成员星野退学，阿拜多斯已不复存在，众人大惊。众人以“對策委員會”尚存抗争，但綾音表示，由于学生会当时已不存在，所以它并非官方认证的社团，因而实际上无法代表学校，也无法被证明存在。

desc.en: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.

desc.zh_tw: 星野听到PMC攻击阿拜多斯时震惊无比。黑服向星野解释，因为她自己退学，阿拜多斯就没有了学生会成员（即没有了学生会），由此学校已经不复存在。黑服表示了对PMC建立一所新学校的兴趣，但随后表示他们的目标实际上是星野自己，而与凯撒联手仅仅是因为利益不冲突罢了。黑服表示，作为基沃托斯最高的“神秘”，他将会对她进行实验。

desc.en: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.

desc.en: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.

desc.en: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.

desc.en: The Black Suit says he knows quite well about Sensei. In Black Suit's eyes, Sensei is the biggest obstacle and so he doesn't and shouldn't be hostile with Sensei, but rather he should seek cooperation. Sensei asks about his identity, and Black Suit says he is a member of "Gematria". He then asks what Sensei is looking for in Kivotos, but Sensei doesn't listen. The Black Suit adds that, Sensei's behaviour is no longer justified at this time, and he asks whether Sensei even knows well about his rights. He says that Hoshino is no longer a student belonging to Abydos, and mentions about the resignation letter.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服表示他很了解老师。黑服认为老师的障碍为最大，因而他不想也不应与老师敌对，相反则试图寻求合作。老师询问他的身份，黑服则表示自己是“数秘术”的人，并询问老师究竟在基沃托斯寻求着什么，老师不想岔开话题。黑服继续表示，老师的行为此刻已不具备正当性，询问老师是否明白自己的权利如何。他表示星野已经不再是阿拜多斯的学生，并提到了那封退社申请书。

desc.en: It turns out there is a column named "Advisor" on the application. And as a teacher invited from Schale, the application is nothing more than a piece of paper if without Sensei's signature. And so Hoshino still belongs to the Foreclosure Task Force, still belongs to Abydos High School, and of course still one of Sensei's students.

And so Hoshino still belongs to the Foreclosure Task Force, still belongs to Abydos High School, and of course still one of Sensei's students.

desc.zh_tw: 实际上，申请书上有“顾问”一栏。而作为被从夏萊请来当顾问的老师，不存在老师签名的申请书只是废纸一张，因而星野仍然属于對策委員會，仍然属于阿拜多斯，仍然是自己的学生。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 实际上，申请书上有“顾问”一栏。而作为被从夏莱请来当顾问的老师，不存在老师签名的申请书只是废纸一张，因而星野仍然属于对策委员会，仍然属于阿拜多斯，仍然是自己的学生。

desc.en: The Black Suit gets the idea and disdains such troublesome procedures. Sensei then goes on criticizing the Black Suits, saying they "not only deceive those childrens, tramp their hearts, but also take advantages of their sufferings." The Black Suit doesn't deny the fact that he pursues self-interests, but that's with a clear boundary: the desertification of Abydos isn't their doings, and they are just taking advantages of this disaster.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服明白了这点，鄙夷这种麻烦的手续。老师又接着批判黑服，“不但欺骗那些孩子，践踏她们的心，还利用她们的痛苦”。黑服并不否认追求自己利益这一点，但划分了界限：阿拜多斯的沙漠化并非他们造成，他们只是利用了这一灾难。

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: "Those with power exploit those without, those with knowledge exploit those without," Black Suit explains the truth about the world to Sensei. The Black Suit repeats that deal, wanting Sensei to stop interfering them. They promises they will take on half of the debt, and they can keep others at Abydos High School safe and sound. But Sensei rejects it still.

desc.zh_tw: “有权者压榨无权者，有识者压榨无知者，”黑服向老师阐述了这一世间真理。黑服重复了那个提案，让老师放弃干涉他们，由他们承担一半的债务，同时也不会影响阿拜多斯其他学生的上学。但老师拒绝了提案。

desc.en: The Black Suit cannot comprehend Sensei's choice. He doubts about the ability that Sensei possesses to be enemy with them, and Sensei takes out the Adult's Card - a weapon exclusive to Sensei. But the Black Suit warns Sensei, that the more he use it, the more it will be destroyed, and it will also cost Sensei's life and time. The Black Suit reminds Sensei that he still need to do a lot of daily stuff with it, and mentions again that this has nothing to do with him in the very beginning. Yet Sensei rejects that again.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服无法理解老师的选择。他质疑老师与他们敌对的作战能力，老师不得不掏出大人的卡片。这是独属于老师的武器，但黑服也警告称，它越是使用越会被毁灭，会消耗老师的生命与时间。黑服提到老师还需要用它做许多其他的日常事情，还提到这本就与他无关，但老师仍然拒绝。

desc.en: The Black Suit cannot understand Sensei's choice. He asks, questions Sensei, while Sensei just says, "For the sufferings of those children, no one's willing to take the responsibility." The Black Suit is confused, saying that Sensei has neither any kinship nor consanguinity with them, but only an outsider who happened to meet them - and none of the responsibilities should be shouldered by Sensei. Sensei then says, "That's what an adult should do."

desc.zh_tw: 黑服无法理解老师的选择。他反问老师、质询老师。老师则表示，“对于那些孩子的痛苦，没有人愿意负责。”黑服不解，表示老师与这些孩子没有任何亲缘和血缘上的关系，只是一个正好遇见他们的外人，这些责任并非老师需要承担。老师则只是表示，“那是大人该做的事”。

desc.en: The Black Suit now understands and begins to correct Sensei's ideas. "The so-called adults, are the ones who are able to transform the society to one that fits well in their own ideal dream, the ones who make rules, define what's normal or not, who's ordinary or not. The ones who use authority, knowledge and power to govern those without - and that's what I call an adult." The Black Suit stresses that it isn't unrelated to Sensei, as Sensei could have become the ruler of the Kivotos, yet Sensei doesn't. The Black Suit can't get Sensei's intent.

desc.zh_tw: 黑服理解，但开始纠正老师的想法。“所谓的大人，是能将社会改造成自己理想的样子，制定规则，定义什么是正常与不正常，定义什么是平凡与非凡的人。用权力、知识、力量统治无权者、无知者、无力者的人，那就是大人。”黑服表示这并非与老师无关，老师本也可成为基沃托斯的支配者，但老师并没有选择这么做，黑服不解老师的意图。

desc.en: Sensei says that even speaking out would not make him understood. The Black Suit ends with "Then you'd be just rescuing your students," contemptuously, and wishes Sensei good luck.

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force welcomes Sensei. The all shouts out "Let's rescue Hoshino" loud. Sensei also says that they should "give Hoshino some lessons" and Nonomi agrees that - after all, Hoshino broke her own promise. Sensei even says that they would have lines like "Say to her 'Welcome Back' and should she say 'I Am Back'!"

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會的大家欢迎了老师。众人齐声喊出“救出星野吧！”老师还提到，要“狠狠教训星野一顿”，野乃美表示同意，毕竟星野违背了自己的诺言。老师还说，要“对她说‘欢迎回来’，让她说出‘我回来了’！”这样的台词。
